description.narrative: New Element, which contributes to Technical Excellence In Policy And Programmes. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Operational Support To Programme Delivery. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: New Element

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

description.narrative: In 2021, the office focused on increasing the number of supporters for the cause of children, while at the same time, reach younger audiences on traditional and social media. Also, to continue the high-level advocacy with Government while further engaging with the private sector and civil society. Finally, to increase the visibility of donors as a way to thank them for their contribution and increase resource mobilization by raising the voice of beneficiaries. | Status:Met | As-of Date:31/01/2022
